field-definition.field-label: Instructions for Answering Criminal Conviction Question

A conviction will not automatically bar anyone from employment. An individualized assessment will be made based on the job in question and consistent with business necessity. The following question seeks information regarding your past criminal history. Please note the following: • A ‘yes’ answer will not automatically disqualify you from employment. • However, failure to disclose a reportable offense will be considered a falsification of Company records and will disqualify you from employment, no matter when the falsification is discovered. If you reside in or are applying for a position in the City of Buffalo, NY, Newark, NJ, Philadelphia, PA, San Francisco, CA, Seattle, WA and/or live in the State of California, Connecticut, District of Columbia, Georgia, Hawaii, Iowa, Illinois, Maryland, Massachusetts, Michigan, Minnesota, Nebraska, Nevada, New York, Ohio, Pennsylvania, Rhode Island, refer to the instructions below specific to your State and/or city before answering the criminal conviction question. Thoroughly read and carefully follow the applicable instructions available HERE before answering the below criminal history question(s). NOTE: Every effort has been made to ensure the accuracy of this list, however, it is possible that interpretations and/or updates may have occurred, which are not reflected herein. DO NOT IDENTIFY a record of adult or juvenile arrest, detention or conviction that has been sealed, expunged, annulled, erased, pardoned or statutorily eradicated, set aside or otherwise dismissed by court order.
By inputting anything into the following field you will indicate that you understand these INSTRUCTIONS FOR ANSWERING THE CRIMINAL CONVICTION QUESTION and agree that your electronic signature is legally binding, and has the same validity and meaning as your handwritten signature on a paper document.

Have you been convicted or pled guilty or no contest or nolo contendre to a felony or misdemeanor crime within the past 7 years that has not erased, expunged, sealed, impounded, annulled, set aside, pardoned or otherwise eradicated. (You should answer “no” if the conviction was erased, expunged, sealed, impounded, annulled, set aside, pardoned or otherwise eradicated.

If you answered “YES”, please review the city/state-specific instructions above and then describe the nature of the crime(s); the date of conviction(s) or plea(s); the city, county and state where the conviction(s)/plea(s) occurred; the sentence imposed; and subsequent rehabilitation.

field-definition.field-label: Candidate Justification (Include a brief summary of how candidate is suitable for role)

field-definition.field-label: Подробные данные отклика на объявление о вакансии
We want to process your application as efficiently as possible. Please take care to complete the information below as accurately as possible.
Wir möchten Ihre Bewerbung so effizient wie möglich bearbeiten. Füllen Sie deshalb die folgenden Informationen so genau wie möglich aus.
Deseamos procesar su aplicación con la mayor eficiencia posible. Complete la información siguiente con la mayor exactitud posible.
Nous souhaitons traiter votre candidature le plus efficacement possible. Veillez à compléter avec exactitude les informations ci-dessous.
できるだけ効率的にあなたの応募を処理させていただきます。 できるだけ正確に以下の情報を入力するように気を付けてください。
귀하의 지원서를 가능한 효율적으로 처리하고자 합니다. 아래 정보를 최대한 정확하게 작성하여 주십시오.
Queremos processar sua candidatura da maneira mais eficiente possível. Tome o cuidado de completar as informações abaixo da maneira mais precisa possível.
Мы постараемся обработать ваш отклик на объявление о вакансии наиболее эффективным образом. Аккуратно заполните нижеуказанные поля данных.
我们将尽可能高效地处理您的申请。 请尽可能准确填写以下信息。
Personal Information These fields can be changed on your Candidate profile.
Persönliche InformationenDiese Felder können in Ihrem Kandidatenprofil geändert werden.
Información personalEstos campos se pueden modificar en el perfil del candidato.
Informations personnellesCes champs peuvent être modifiés dans votre profil de candidat.
個人情報これらのフィールドは、候補者プロファイルで変更が可能です。
개인 정보이 필드는 후보자 프로파일에서 수정할 수 있습니다.
Informações pessoaisEstes campos podem ser alterados em seu perfil do candidato.
Личная информацияЭти поля можно изменить в профиле кандидата.
个人信息可在候选人简档中更改这些字段。
ミドルネームのイニシャル
field-definition.field-description: ミドルネームのイニシャル

field-definition.field-label: Nombre por el que se le conoce
field-definition.field-description: If you do not use your legal First Name, please provide your "Known As" name
Wenn Sie Ihren legalen Vornamen nicht verwenden, geben Sie bitte Ihren Rufnamen an.
Si no utiliza su nombre registrado, complete el campo "Nombre por el que se le conoce"
Si vous n'utilisez pas votre prénom légal, indiquez le nom sous lequel vous êtes connu (« Connu sous le nom »).
正式名を使用しない場合は、"別名" の名前を入力してください。
법적 이름을 사용하지 않는 경우 "별명"을 입력하십시오.
Se você não utiliza seu Nome legal, forneça seu nome "Conhecido como"
Если вы указываете имя, не соответствующее имени в удостоверении личности, необходимо указать имя "Основное имя"
如果不使用合法名字，请提供您的别名

field-definition.field-description: WARNING: This field is not encrypted, use with caution
WARNUNG: Dieses Feld ist nicht verschlüsselt; mit Vorsicht verwenden.
ADVERTENCIA: Este campo no está cifrado, úselo con medida
AVERTISSEMENT : Ce champ n'est pas chiffré. À utiliser avec précaution.
警告: このフィールドは暗号化されません。注意して使用してください。
경고: 이 필드는 암호화되지 않으니 주의해서 사용하십시오.
AVISO: Este campo não é criptografado, use com cuidado
ПРЕДУПРЕЖДЕНИЕ! Это поле не закодировано, используйте его аккуратно.
警告： 此字段未加密，请慎用

field-definition.field-label: その他の州の場合 (指定してください)
field-definition.field-description: If you do not currently reside in Australia, provide the State/Province relevant to your residential location
Wenn Sie derzeit nicht in Australien leben, geben Sie das Bundesland bzw. die Provinz Ihres Wohnorts an.
Si no reside en Australia actualmente, indique el estado o provincia en el que se encuentra su vivienda actual
Si vous ne résidez pas en Australie actuellement, indiquez l'État/la province correspondant à votre lieu de résidence.
現在オーストラリアに居住していない場合は、居住場所に関連する都道府県/州を入力してください。
현재 호주에 거주하지 않는 경우 거주 지역의 시/도를 입력하십시오.
Se você não reside atualmente na Austrália, forneça o Estado/Distrito relevante ao seu local de residência
Если в настоящее время вы не проживаете в Австралии, укажите штат/провинцию своего места проживания.
如果当前未居住在澳大利亚，请提供居住地点所属的州/省

Geben Sie die ursprüngliche Quelle an, von der Sie über diese Stelle gehört haben. Suchmaschine? Stellenausschreibungsplattform?
Indique la fuente por la que supo por primera vez de este puesto. ¿Motor de búsqueda? ¿Panel de empleos?
Indiquez la source initiale par laquelle vous avez entendu parler du poste. Moteur de recherche ? Site de recrutement ?
この職務について聞いた提供元を指定してください。 検索エンジン 求人サイト
이 직무에 대해 알게 된 경로 표시 검색 엔진? 채용 게시판?
Indique a fonte original pela qual soube deste cargo. Mecanismo de busca? Painel de vagas?
Укажите, каким образом вы узнали о данной вакансии. Поисковая машина? Доска объявлений о вакансиях?
指明您通过何种渠道了解到此职位的信息。 搜索引擎？ 职位公告板？

field-definition.field-label: Informations sur l'égalité d'accès à l'emploi
Informações sobre igualdade de oportunidades de emprego

We ask for your assistance. We are an equal opportunity employer. The following information is used to help us improve our recruiting programs. Please be aware that you are not required to provide the requested information and any information you do provide will be treated confidentially. If you choose not to provide this information, your decision will have no effect on the company’s employment decision. Thank you for your help and cooperation.

Wir bitten um Ihre Hilfe. Wir fördern als Arbeitgeber die Chancengleichheit. Die folgenden Informationen helfen uns bei der Verbesserung unserer Recruiting-Programme. Beachten Sie, dass Sie nicht verpflichtet sind, die geforderten Informationen einzugeben. Alle Informationen, die Sie eingeben, werden vertraulich behandelt. Ihre Entscheidung, diese Informationen nicht einzugeben, hat keinerlei Auswirkung auf die Einstellungsentscheidung des Unternehmens. Vielen Dank für Ihre Hilfe und Ihre Mitwirkung.

Por favor, ayúdenos. En nuestra empresa ofrecemos empleo sin discriminar a los candidatos. La siguiente información se utilizará para ayudarnos a mejorar nuestros programas de contratación. Tenga en cuenta que no está obligado a facilitar la información solicitada, y que los datos que nos indique serán tratados con total confidencialidad. Si opta por no facilitar esta información, su decisión no influirá en la decisión de la empresa de contratarle o no. Gracias por su ayuda y cooperación.

Nous demandons votre assistance. En tant qu'entreprise soucieuse de l'égalité des chances, nous nous appuyons sur les informations qui suivent pour améliorer nos programmes de recrutement. Sachez que vous n'avez pas l'obligation de fournir les informations demandées et que toutes les informations fournies seront traitées de façon confidentielle. Si vous décidez de ne pas fournir ces informations, votre refus n'aura aucune incidence sur la décision de la société de vous employer ou non. Merci pour votre aide et votre coopération.
あなたの支援をお願いいたします。 当社は、機会均等を提供している雇用者です。 以下の情報は、当社の採用プログラムの改善に役立てるために使用されます。 依頼された情報およびあなたが提供するすべての情報は機密情報として扱われます。 この情報を提供しないことを選択した場合でも、当社の雇用決定には影響しません。 ご助力とご協力に感謝いたします。
귀하의 지원을 요청드립니다. 당사는 평등 고용 기업입니다. 다음 정보는 채용 프로그램을 개선하는데 사용됩니다. 요청드린 정보는 꼭 입력해야 하는 것은 아니며 제공하신 정보는 기밀 처리됩니다. 이 정보를 입력하지 않으셔도 채용 결정에 전혀 영향을 주지 않습니다. 귀하의 협조에 감사드립니다.

Pedimos sua assistência. Somos empregadores com igualdade de oportunidades de emprego. As informações a seguir são usadas para nos ajudar a melhorar nossos programas de recrutamento. Você não é obrigado a fornecer as informações solicitadas e quaisquer informações fornecidas serão mantidas confidenciais. Se preferir não fornecer essas informações, sua decisão não afetará a decisão de emprego da empresa. Obrigado por sua ajuda e cooperação.

Нам требуется ваша поддержка. Мы являемся работодателем, предоставляющим одинаковые возможности при приеме на работу. Нижеуказанная информация используется для улучшения наших программ по поиску и подбору персонала. Примите во внимание, что вы не обязаны предоставлять всю требуемую информацию, а вся предоставленная информация является конфиденциальной. Если вы решите не предоставлять информацию, такое решение не повлияет на решение компании по вопросу трудоустройства. Спасибо за поддержку и сотрудничество.
我们需要您的协助。 我们是提倡就业机会均等的雇主。 以下信息将用于帮助我们改进招聘计划。 请注意，我们并不强制要求您提供所要求的信息，您所提供的任何信息都将被视为机密信息。 如果选择不提供此信息，您的决定不会对公司的录用决策产生任何影响。 感谢您的帮助与合作。
Do you identify as an Aboriginal or a Torres Strait Islander?
Sind Sie ein Ureinwohner oder ein Bewohner der Torres-Strait-Inseln?
¿Se identifica como aborigen o como oriundo de Torres Strait Island?
Vous identifiez-vous comme autochtone ou insulaire du détroit de Torres ?
アボリジニまたはトレス諸島民ですか。
원주민 또는 토레스 해협 제도 원주민이십니까?
Você se identifica como aborígene ou nativo do Estreito de Torres?
Вы относитесь к аборигенам и жителям островов Торресова пролива?
您是土著或托雷斯海峡岛民吗？
ベトナム戦争経験者の退役軍人:
障がいを持つ退役軍人:

Why are you being asked to complete this form? Because we do business with the government, we must reach out to, hire, and provide equal opportunity to qualified people with disabilities.i To help us measure how well we are doing, we are asking you to tell us if you have a disability or if you ever had a disability. Completing this form is voluntary, but we hope that you will choose to fill it out. If you are applying for a job, any answer you give will be kept private and will not be used against you in any way. If you already work for us, your answer will not be used against you in any way. Because a person may become disabled at any time, we are required to ask all of our employees to update their information every five years. You may voluntarily self-identify as having a disability on this form without fear of any punishment because you did not identify as having a disability earlier. How do I know if I have a disability?
You are considered to have a disability if you have a physical or mental impairment tor medical condition that substantially limits a major life activity, or if you have a history or record of such an impairment or medical condition. Disabilities include, but are not limited to:
Blindness Deafness Cancer Diabetes Epilepsy Autism
Cerebral Palsy HIV/AIDS Schizophrenia Muscular Dystrophy Bipolar Disorder Major Depression
Multiple Sclerosis (MS) Missing limbs or partially missing limbs Post-traumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD) Obsessive Compulsive Disorder Impairments requiring the use of a wheelchair Intellectual disability (previously called mental retardation)
Please select one of the options below:

Reasonable Accommodation Notice Federal law requires employers to provide reasonable accommodation to qualified individuals with disabilities. Please tell us if you required a reasonable accommodation to apply for a job or to perform your job. Examples of reasonable accommodation include making a change to the application process or work procedures, providing documents in an alternate format, using a sign language interpreter, or using specialized equipment. Section 503 of the Rehabilitation Act of 1973, as amended. For more information about this form or the equal employment obligations of Federal contractors, visit the U.S. Department of Labor's Office of Federal Contract Compliance Programs (OFCCP) website at www.dol.gov/ofccp. PUBLIC BURDEN STATEMENT: According to the Paperwork Reduction Act of 1995 no persons are required to respond to a collection of information unless such collection displays a valid OMB control number. This survey should take about 5 minutes to complete.
Документы для отклика на объявление о вакансии
